detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a wide, relaxed fit with a lined wrapover hood with a drawstring, dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded parka with a detachable lined hood with a faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Strapless, lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Kids Exclusive. Trousers in sturdy twill made from organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell. Easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with large patch front pockets.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a fine knit containing some wool. High waist with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined stand-up collar, zip down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons down the front.
Bra in jersey and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 41-49 cm. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Triangle bikini top with lace trims, lined cups with removable inserts, narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and ties at the back.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies in various designs.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Thick socks in a fine-knit wool blend with foldover tops.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Small imitation leather pouch in the shape of a watermelon with decorative studs on the front and a zip at the top. Keyring and carabiner hook in metal on one side. Lined. Size 7x12 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and pleated sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Short, fitted nightslip in soft pima cotton jersey with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine knit with a sheen. Textured-knit stripes, pointelle-patterned sections and 3/4-length sleeves.
Knee socks with elasticated tops. 100 denier.
Satin top with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and raw-edge lace at the top.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with sequined embroidery and a round neck. Buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length boiler suit woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, a V-neck and concealed buttons at the top. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch front pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a tab and button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a tie belt, a concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, and straight legs with creases front and back.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Small bucket bag with a suede upper section and a lower section in braided water hyacinth. One zipped inner compartment and a magnetic press-stud fastening at the top. The bag has a long metal shoulder strap but can also be carried as a handbag. Lined. Size 9x16.5x23 cm.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in woven fabric. V-neck top in a double layer with narrow, double shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidery at the top, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and lace trims at the chest, waist and hem. Concealed zip in the side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Size 4 cm.
Round-necked playsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Raglan butterfly sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short dress in cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace. Opening cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with a wrapover front, wide ties at the hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Fully lined bikini. Top with a wide flounce with laser-cut scalloped edges, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck, a small metal decoration on one strap and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with laser-cut scalloped edges.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Sleeveless jersey top in a straight cut with a lace-covered V-neck and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and flared skirt.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Striped rugby shirt in slub cotton jersey with a cotton twill collar, concealed button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back. Wide elastication at the waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Lined bikini tops with a concealed silicone trim at the top and no shoulder straps.

Wide-fitting shirt in a checked cotton weave with twisted side seams, a turn-down collar and classic front. Two flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke at the back and a visible central seam.
Short top in soft, printed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.

Dungarees in washed superstretch denim with worn details. Adjustable, detachable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Chest pocket, back pockets and fake front pockets.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, decorative zips at the top, back pockets and slim legs.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
A-line skirt in imitation leather with elastication at the back of the waist, a press-stud at the front and a fake fly. Decorative diagonal front pockets with a zip. Unlined.
Sleeveless A-line dress woven in a sturdy viscose blend with a concealed zip at the back and seam at the hem with a pleated section below. Lined.
